5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Anas bin Malik said:“I heard the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) say: ‘Whoever prays Duha with twelve Rak’ah, Allah will build for him a palace of gold in Paradise.’”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي صَلاَةِ الضُّحَى
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning Duha Prayer
